citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 on
15-May-18.Upon arrival, I called and texted the phone number listed. The licensee informed me she was away and
could not return in time for the inspection process.
This is the first attempted inspection.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 on
15-May-18.Upon arrival, I called and texted the phone number listed. The licensee informed me she was away and
could not return in time for the inspection process. 
This is the first attempted inspection.
